snippet.title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – Nintendo Direct 3.27.2025
snippet.description:
Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is launching on Nintendo Switch in 2025. Wishlist today: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/metroid-prime-4-beyond-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=A1013-01&utm_id=A1013-01

Harness Samus Aran's new psychic abilities to survive the mysterious planet of Viewros and find a way home when Metroid Prime 4: Beyond comes to Nintendo Switch in 2025.

#MetroidPrime4 #NintendoSwitch #NintendoDirect

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
